DOC.brief_summary: To show whether One Shape rotary system differs Reciproc reciprocate system postoperative pain patient symptomatic irreversible pulpitis .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Postoperative Pain Using Reciproc Versus One Shape Files Patients With Irreversible Pulpitis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients clinic endodontics faculty oral dental medicine , Cairo University , Urban area , Cairo governorate , Egypt . The dental Unit Adec 200 U.S.A . The x-ray Machine ViVi , S.r.I , Italy The x-ray film Kodac , speed D , size 2 . The operator master degree student department Endodontics . No dental assistant Time : 2016-2017 Diagnosis The diagnostic data collect case report form investigator confirm eligibility assistant supervisor enrol study day . Diagnosis do following : Recording chief complaint history pain Clinical examination evaluate ( sensitivity ) pulp tissue use cold testing ( use Green Endo ice ) , electric tester . The patient experience prolong response cold test positive response electric pulp test Radiographic examination : There periapical radiolucency except widen periodontal ligament . Intervention Full medical dental history use schematic dental chart obtain patient treat study . Each tooth evaluate vitality ( sensitivity ) pulp tissue use electric pulp tester . The patient randomly divide 2 group : Experimental group Reciproc single-file reciprocate instrumentation system . Control group One Shape single-file rotary instrumentation system . Sequence Procedural step Preoperative pain assess NRS administration anesthesia . Local anesthesia achieve use 2 % lidocaine ( 1:100,000 adrenaline ) . An access cavity perform use round bur Endo-Z bur1 . . The tooth properly isolated rubber dam . Working length determine use electronic apex locator2 , work length confirm radiograph use K-file3 . Then work length establish 0.5 mm radiographic apex . Canals explore hand K-file ISO size 10 , 15 , 20 . Mechanical preparation group follow Experimental group Canals instrument use Reciproc4 reciprocate system set electric motor5 , adjust torque speed accord manufacturer 's instruction . There need coronal preflaring Gates Glidden drill orifice opener since design Reciproc instrument allow obstruction coronal third remove , claim - Reciproc file selection : R40 ( 40/0.06 ) manufacturer . Control group Coronal preflaring perform use Gates Glidden drill . Canals instrument use One Shape1 single-file ( 25/0.06 ) set electric motor2 adjust torque speed accord manufacturer 's instruction . For wide canal , One Shape Apical ( 30/0.06 , 37/0.06 ) use . The rotary file introduce inside canal use EDTA gel3.. Canals irrigate 2.5 % sodium hypochlorite solution every subsequent instrument . It prepare add 11 ml sterile distil water use 27 gauge needle fit 5ml disposable plastic syringe place canal space without bind Canals dry sterile paper point obturate use lateral condensation technique . A spreader use allow space auxiliary cone , resin-based root canal sealer . The tooth seal temporary restoration , postoperative pain assess immediately end treatment . The patient phone call follow 6 , 12 , 24 , 48 72 hour . The patient instruct return complete treatment procedure place full-coverage restoration . The patient instruct take one tablet 600 mg Ibuprofen he/she experience severe pain . Outcomes Primary Outcome : Intensity postoperative pain measure use numerical rating scale ( NRS ) immediately end treatment , 6 , 12 , 24 , 48 , 72 hour end endodontic treatment . The numerical rating scale ( 0-10 scale ) consist line anchor two extreme `` 0 : pain '' `` 10 : severe pain '' ; patient ask choose mark represent level pain 0 10 . Pain level assign one 4 categorical score : 0 , None ; 1 , Mild ( 1-3 ) ; 2 , Moderate ( 4-6 ) ; 3 , Severe ( 7-10 ) 0 : None 1 . Mild ( 1-3 ) 2 . Moderate ( 4-6 ) 3 . Severe ( 7-10 ) Secondary outcome Number analgesic take patient decrease postoperative pain 3 day end endodontic treatment record patient time interval . Participant Timeline : After patient find eligible , he/she randomly assign either control ( One Shape ) experimental group ( Reciproc ) treat single visit . At end treatment , patient ask record postoperative pain NRS immediately , 6,12,24,48 72 hour .
DOC.criteria: . Age 2545years old . ii . Males Females . iii . Mandibular premolar teeth : Single canal Preoperative sharp pain . Vital response pulp tissue . Normal periapical radiographic appearance slight widen lamina dura . . Patients already consume preoperative medication , analgesic , nonsteroidal steroidal antiinflammatory drug , within 12 hour treatment . ii . Patients one tooth quadrant and/or opposite quadrant require endodontic treatment . iii . Pregnant female . iv . Patients significant systemic disorder . v. If antibiotic administrate past two week preoperatively . vi . Patients bruxism clench . vii . Teeth : Nonvital pulp tissue . Association swell fistulous tract . A pocket depth great 5 mm . Previous endodontic treatment .
